captions: Nature gives us all the inspiration we need 💭
Begging him to do corny couple things with me 😊
@Cartier never misses. Introducing the new Double C de Cartier bag to add to your collection. She's chic, compact, and multifaceted. What are you dreaming to C today? #AD #DOUBLECDECARTIER

It’s been a few years of working with @cartier now, and every time is a pinch me moment! To be a part of a global tribe of strong and confident women representing the power of the panthère spirit, a beautiful fragrance created by @mathilde.laurent is truly an honor. If you’d like to discover the fragrance for yourself, be sure to check my “Cartier” highlight and enjoy a gift from Maison Cartier this holiday season 🐆 #PanthèredeCartier #CartierParfums
